hume
Class DoubleSidedMatching.Accounting

java.lang.Object
  hume.DoubleSidedMatching.Accounting
Enclosing class:
DoubleSidedMatching
public class DoubleSidedMatching.Accounting
extends java.lang.Object

Provides services for the self-monitoring of the DoubleSidedMatching- Algroithm. As of this is very sketchy. More a hack than a solution. Probably some general "accounting" solution should be thought, since we want to monitor all components of the simulation during the simulation run...?

Author:
eckhart
